ValidationRule.description: List of fields needed for activation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( TODAY() < ADDMONTHS(Birthdate__c, 14), HealthCareRecordsStatus__c <> "All Good" ), AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), 'Active')), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Active')))
